de.ityx.contex.impl.document

Class CDocumentStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ityx.contex.impl.document.CDocumentStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public abstract class CDocumentStore
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Speichert ein CDocumentContainer oder CDocument auf dem Dateisystem.

                           String fileName)
                                    throws IOException
        Speichert jedes CDocument des CDocumentContainer unter dem angegebenen Pfad.

      • saveDocument

        public static File saveDocument(CDocument document,
                String path,
                String fileName,
                String encoding)
                         throws IOException
        Saves the given CDocument with given file name in given directory. If no file name is provided, the title of given CDocument is used or "noname" if given document does not have a title.
        Parameters:
        document - CDocument to save
        path - directory to store in
        fileName - name of file
        encoding - the encoding that should be used for text based documents (txt, xml, html, ...)
        Returns:
        File the actual created file name
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs

      • saveDocument

        public static File saveDocument(CDocument document,
                String path,
                String fileName)
                         throws IOException
        Saves the given CDocument with given file name in given directory. If no file name is provided, the title of given CDocument is used or "noname" if given document does not have a title.
        Returns the actual created file name. (If the given file name already exists the created file will be renamed)
        Parameters:
        document - CDocument to save
        path - directory to store in
        fileName - name of file
        Returns:
        File the actual file name of the stored file
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs
